title: Next.js Fortress
short_description: nextjs-fortress is an open-source security middleware for Next.js applications designed to help protect users against known vulnerabilities and strengthen request validation. It acts as a security validation layer that can be added to Next.js projects to enforce checks and mitigate attack vectors (including protection for issues such as CVE-2025-55182 and similar threats).
shortDescription: nextjs-fortress is an open-source security middleware for Next.js applications designed to help protect users against known vulnerabilities and strengthen request validation. It acts as a security validation layer that can be added to Next.js projects to enforce checks and mitigate attack vectors (including protection for issues such as CVE-2025-55182 and similar threats).

title: MonoDog
short_description: Monodog provides developers with a centralized visual interface to track workspace health, analyze package dependencies, and view Git histories across all individual modules in a single view. By automating the oversight of complex repo structures, it replaces manual CLI checks with a streamlined UI that monitors build statuses and security vulnerabilities in real-time.
shortDescription: Monodog provides developers with a centralized visual interface to track workspace health, analyze package dependencies, and view Git histories across all individual modules in a single view. By automating the oversight of complex repo structures, it replaces manual CLI checks with a streamlined UI that monitors build statuses and security vulnerabilities in real-time.

title: TextIgniter
short_description: TextIgniterJS is a lightweight, powerful, and intuitive HTML editor library built in TypeScript that provides rich-text editing features developers can integrate into web projects. It offers common editor capabilities like bold, italic, underline, lists, tables, hyperlinks, image insertion, and lets you retrieve editor content as HTML or JSON for use in your app UI or workflows.
shortDescription: TextIgniterJS is a lightweight, powerful, and intuitive HTML editor library built in TypeScript that provides rich-text editing features developers can integrate into web projects. It offers common editor capabilities like bold, italic, underline, lists, tables, hyperlinks, image insertion, and lets you retrieve editor content as HTML or JSON for use in your app UI or workflows.
